title: Sweet apricot kugel
ingredients: ['225g tagliatelle or other wide ribbon pasta', '50g butter, softened', '85g cream cheese, softened', '3 eggs, beaten', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250ml apricot juice', '250ml milk', '70g golden raisins', '140g cornflakes cereal, crushed', '110g butter, softened', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
